[00:00.00]Self Care (Explicit) - Mac Miller
[00:06.58]Lyricist：D. Natche/J. Cantero/P. Mudge/M. McCormick/D. Hynes/D. Route/E. Wright
[00:13.16]Producer：DJ Dahi
[00:19.75]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[00:23.11]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:27.51]I switched the time zone but what do I know
[00:30.91]Spending nights hitchhikin' where will I go
[00:34.52]I could fly home with my eyes closed
[00:37.68]But it be kinda hard to see that's no surprise though
[00:40.94]You can find me I ain't hiding
[00:44.47]I don't move my feet when I be gliding
[00:47.89]I just slide in and then I roll out
[00:53.09]Yeah well climbing over that wall
[00:57.77]I remember yes I remember yes I remember it all
[01:01.08]Swear the height be too tall so like September I fall
[01:04.50]Down below now I know that the medicine be on call yeah
[01:08.64]It's feeling like you hot enough to melt yeah
[01:11.70]Can't trust no one can't even trust yourself yeah
[01:15.31]And I love you I don't love nobody else yeah
[01:18.93]Tell them they can take that bullsh*t elsewhere
[01:22.13]Self care I'm treatin' me right
[01:28.99]Hell yea we're gonna be alright
[01:33.12]We gon' be alright
[01:35.09]I switched the time zone but what do I know
[01:38.55]Spending nights hitchhikin' where will I go
[01:42.06]I could fly home with my eyes closed
[01:45.28]But it be kinda hard to see that's no surprise though

[01:52.10]I don't move my feet when I be gliding
[01:55.46]I just slide in and then I roll out
[02:03.44]Been on the road
[02:05.93]I don't see it
[02:08.49]Out on the road
[02:09.36]I don't see it
[02:11.21]Out on the road
[02:15.04]Yeah I been reading them signs
[02:18.88]I been losin' my I been losin' my I been losin' my mind yeah
[02:22.20]Get the f**k out the way must be this high to play
[02:25.47]It must be nice up above the lights and what a lovely life that I made
[02:29.09]I know that feelin' like it's in my family tree yeah
[02:32.81]That Mercedes drove me crazy I was speedin'
[02:36.75]Somebody save me from myself yeah
[02:39.99]Tell them they can take that bullsh*t elsewhere
[02:43.27]Self care we gonna be good
[02:50.13]Hell yeah they lettin' me go
[02:56.30]I switched the time zone but what do I know
[02:59.64]Spending nights hitchhikin' where will I go
[03:03.23]I could fly home with my eyes closed
[03:06.34]But it be kinda hard to see that's no surprise though
[03:09.77]You can find me I ain't hiding
[03:13.34]I don't move my feet when I be gliding
[03:16.69]I just slide in and then I roll out
[03:27.66]I didn't know I didn't know
[03:31.73]I didn't know I didn't know hey
[03:36.86]Well didn't know what I was missing
[03:39.55]Now it see a lil' different
[03:41.09]I was thinking too much
[03:43.55]Got stuck in oblivion yeah yeah
[03:46.37]Oblivion yeah yeah
[03:48.29]Oblivion yeah yeah
[03:52.84]I got all the time in the world
[03:55.40]So for now I'm just chilling
[03:57.46]Plus I know it's a it's a beautiful feeling
[03:59.99]In oblivion yeah yeah
[04:02.14]Oblivion yeah yeah
[04:04.23]Oblivion yeah yeah
[04:07.91]Yeah ok I ride around my city when I come home
[04:13.57]The sun set quickly then get up slow
[04:18.09]My disc connect and upload
[04:20.64]Watch it spin around we just spinnin' round
[04:25.68]Let's go and travel through the unknown
[04:29.55]We play it cool we know we f**ked up yeah
[04:33.64]You keep on sayin' you in love so
[04:36.23]Tell me are you really down
[04:38.82]Are you really down yeah
[04:41.68]Let's go back to my crib and play some 45's
[04:45.59]It's safer there I know there's still a war outside
[04:49.64]We spend our nights all liquored up our mornings high
[04:52.79]Can you feel it now
[04:56.28]Oblivion yeah yeah
[05:00.41]Oblivion yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah

data.trans:
[ti:Self Care]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Self Care]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.58]//
[00:13.16]//
[00:19.75]//
[00:23.11]//
[00:27.51]我转换了时区 但我知道什么呢
[00:30.91]每天晚上搭着便车 我会去到哪里
[00:34.52]我可以闭着眼睛飞回家
[00:37.68]但那就很难看清路了 不过也没什么奇怪的
[00:40.94]你可以找到我 我又没躲
[00:44.47]滑翔的时候 我不会动脚
[00:47.89]我就这样滑进来 然后滚出去
[00:53.09]翻过那面墙
[00:57.77]我记得 是的 我记得 是的 我记得一切
[01:01.08]我发誓 当时真的太高了 所以就像九月一样 我跌落了
[01:04.50]身处低谷 现在我知道该吃药了
[01:08.64]感觉热得快融化了
[01:11.70]谁都不能信 连自己都不能信
[01:15.31]我爱你 除了你谁也不爱
[01:18.93]叫他们带着他们的鬼话滚一边去
[01:22.13]自己照顾自己 我把自己照顾得很好
[01:28.99]没错的 我们会没事的
[01:33.12]我们会没事的
[01:35.09]我转换了时区 但我知道什么呢
[01:38.55]每天晚上搭着便车 我会去到哪里
[01:42.06]我可以闭着眼睛飞回家
[01:45.28]但那就很难看清路了 不过也没什么奇怪的
[01:48.67]你可以找到我 我又没躲
[01:52.10]滑翔的时候 我不会动脚
[01:55.46]我就这样滑进来 然后滚出去
[02:03.44]在路上的时候
[02:05.93]我看不见
[02:08.49]上路之后
[02:09.36]我看不见
[02:11.21]上路之后
[02:15.04]我一直在看路牌
[02:18.88]我快要 我快要 我快要疯了
[02:22.20]滚开点 要玩就要玩大的
[02:25.47]身居高处的感觉肯定很好 我创造的生活真是美好
[02:29.09]我知道那种感觉 好像那是我家族遗传的一样
[02:32.81]那奔驰让我疯了 我超速了
[02:36.75]有没有人救救我 让我别再伤害自己
[02:39.99]叫他们带着他们的鬼话滚一边去
[02:43.27]自己照顾自己 我们会没事的
[02:50.13]他们放开了我
[02:56.30]我转换了时区 但我知道什么呢
[02:59.64]每天晚上搭着便车 我会去到哪里
[03:03.23]我可以闭着眼睛飞回家
[03:06.34]但那就很难看清路了 不过也没什么奇怪的
[03:09.77]你可以找到我 我又没躲
[03:13.34]滑翔的时候 我不会动脚
[03:16.69]我就这样滑进来 然后滚出去
[03:27.66]我不知道 我不知道
[03:31.73]我不知道 我不知道
[03:36.86]不知道自己错过了什么
[03:39.55]现在似乎有点不同了
[03:41.09]我想得太多了
[03:43.55]深陷被遗忘的痛苦中
[03:46.37]被遗忘
[03:48.29]被遗忘
[03:52.84]我已经功成名就了
[03:55.40]所以现在我要冷静一下
[03:57.46]而且我知道 这是 这是很美妙的感觉
[03:59.99]被遗忘
[04:02.14]被遗忘
[04:04.23]被遗忘
[04:07.91]好的 我回家之后 开着车在我的城市里转悠
[04:13.57]太阳落山好快 日出却好慢
[04:18.09]我的光碟放上去
[04:20.64]看着它转啊转 我们也转啊转
[04:25.68]我们走 去穿越无名之地
[04:29.55]我们装作冷静 我们知道我们搞砸了
[04:33.64]你总说你恋爱了 那么
[04:36.23]告诉我 你真的那么渴望吗
[04:38.82]你真的那么渴望吗
[04:41.68]让我们回到我的家里 来点音乐
[04:45.59]我家里更安全 我知道外面还是烽烟四起
[04:49.64]我们通宵达旦 不醉不归 到了早上依然很嗨
[04:52.79]现在你能感受到了吗
[04:56.28]被遗忘
[05:00.41]被遗忘
[05:04.29]被遗忘
[05:12.86]我已经功成名就了
[05:15.28]所以现在我要冷静一下
[05:17.48]而且我知道 这是
[05:18.70]这是很美妙的感觉
[05:20.05]被遗忘
[05:22.18]被遗忘
[05:24.18]被遗忘
